name: Twitch Dark Theme Enhancer
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Modifies the current Twitch.tv dark theme to resemble its older dark theme.
additional_info: Style Settings Top Navigation Menu: Choose between Purple or the Default grey colour. Smooth Chat Scrolling: Smooth scrolling effect with new chat room messages. Channel Info Background Colour: Select the colour used for the channel information bar below the video. Couch Mode: Press F11 to view stream and chat in full screen. Hide Footer: Hides Sign Up message when not logged in. Live Time Format (Experimental): Remove the seconds displayed from live time view. Note: Due to limitations this may not function as expected on all systems.

discussions.name: Bug fix because the site updated the chat input variable:

style_setting_options.label: Enable
Grey (Gradient)
style_setting_options.value: background: linear-gradient(0deg, #0E0E10, rgba(0, 0, 0, .25)), linear-gradient(150deg, rgb(46, 46, 48), rgba(0, 0, 0, .25)) !important

style_setting_options.label: Enable
style_setting_options.value:
/* Couch Mode */

    .tw-align-items-center.tw-flex-wrap.tw-inline-flex.tw-mg-t-05 .tw-full-width.tw-inline-block,
    .tw-ellipsis.tw-font-size-5 .tw-interactive.tw-link,
    .tw-flex-shrink-0.tw-inline-block.tw-mg-x-1,
    .tw-flex.tw-overflow-hidden.tw-pd-r-1,
    .tw-inline-block.tw-mg-r-05,
    .tw-mg-t-1.tw-pd-l-1,
    .tw-mg-t-2.tw-mg-x-2,

    }

    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-1xcs6mc-0 .eiGFTf,
    .tw-border-l,
    .tw-border-t {
        border-style: none !important
    }

    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-1xcs6mc-0 .eiGFTf,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .bIubrA,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .fdDGVb,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .channel-info-content,

        background-color: #000000 !important
    }

    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-1xcs6mc-0 .eiGFTf,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .bIubrA,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .fdDGVb,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .sc-AxjAm .hfjxXA,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-nxg1ff-0 .fOsPDQ,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-nxg1ff-0 .jLilpG,
    .tw-flex.tw-justify-content-between.tw-relative {
        opacity: .33 !important;
        -moz-transition: opacity 3s ease-out !important;
        -o-transition: opacity 3s ease-out !important;
        -webkit-transition: opacity 3s ease-out !important
    }

    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-1xcs6mc-0 .eiGFTf:hover,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .bIubrA:hover,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .fdDGVb:hover,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .sc-AxjAm .hfjxXA:hover,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-nxg1ff-0 .fOsPDQ:hover,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-nxg1ff-0 .jLilpG:hover,
    .tw-flex.tw-justify-content-between.tw-relative:hover {
        opacity: 1 !important;
        -moz-transition: opacity 1s ease-in !important;
        -o-transition: opacity 1s ease-in !important;
        -webkit-transition: opacity 1s ease-in !important
    }

    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-1xcs6mc-0 .eiGFTf,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .bIubrA,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .fdDGVb,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .sc-AxjAm .hfjxXA,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-nxg1ff-0 .fOsPDQ,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .Layout-sc-nxg1ff-0 .jLilpG,
    .tw-root--hover.tw-root--theme-dark .tw-border-t .tw-flex.tw-justify-content-between.tw-relative {
        opacity: .33 !important;
        background-color: #000000 !important;
        border: 0px !important
    }

    .channel-info-content .tw-align-items-center.tw-flex .tw-interactive,
    .channel-info-content .tw-interactive.tw-link {
        color: #639EEF !important;
        pointer-events: none !important
    }
